name: Paddle Flap
description:
Welcome to Paddle Flap, a minimalist casual arcade game where you control a paddle at the bottom of the screen and flap it left or right to bounce falling balls. Use precise timing to control the direction of the balls and hit right targets, avoiding the spiky ones.

Along the way, collect power-ups and earn achievements as you unlock new ball graphics, backgrounds and color themes. Can you master the art of Paddle Flap and become a top scorer? Play now and find out!

Features:

  • High speed ball action
  • Simple but engaging gameplay
  • Satisfying paddle interaction
  • Power-ups
  • Achievements
  • Unlockable balls, backgrounds, color themes and music
